allWorks.title: Rapi UI
allWorks.excerpt: Beautiful & clean components for your react native apps
allWorks.categories: React native, UI Library, Components library
allWorks.content: Rapi UI is a UI components library for react native. The design is beautiful and clean, I personally use this type of design in my projects so why not I pack these components to a npm packages so everyone can use.

allWorks.title: Kawalcovid19.id Vaccine rubric
allWorks.excerpt: I'm contributing to kawalcovid19.id. After I release menujuherdimmunity.id Kawal COVID-19 team invite me to collaborate on building their vaccinate rubric.
allWorks.content:
I'm contributing to kawalcovid19.id. After I release menujuherdimmunity.id Kawal COVID-19 team invite me to collaborate on building their vaccinate rubric.

I design, code and connecting the APIs the vaccine rubric for kawalcovid19.id. also vaccine widget on the home page

allWorks.content: Created a animated touchable component using @FernandoTheRojo's Moti Documentation here

allWorks.title: Menuju Herd Immunity
allWorks.excerpt: Calculation of how far Indonesia goes to "Herd Immunity"
allWorks.content: Calculation of how far Indonesia goes to "Herd Immunity" The calculation is taken from (total recovered people + number of people who have been vaccinated / vaccinated targets) X 100%

allWorks.title: React native Expo starter templates

allWorks.content: These are my starter templates or my way for building mobile app with react native and expo. I'm tired everytime I create a new project from blank, so I decided to make a starter templates, feel free to use it ü•≥ Bonus Snap Midtrans payment gatewayüòò
allWorks.technologyUsed: React Native, Expo, Firebase, Supabase, Midtrans

allWorks.title: Customer Satisfaction Index for PKB Ujung Menteng
allWorks.excerpt: Calculate the operation time and get the Customer satisfaction index value
allWorks.content: This app is a survey for the visitors of PKB Ujung Menteng to calculate the operation time and get the customer satisfaction index value.

allWorks.content:
For those who don‚Äôt know Comika.id is a platform to buy a digital download of a indonesian standup comedy shows.

I want to sharpening my UI and Frontend developing skills so I trying to transforming the website to a mobile app from scratch. This is just me exploring my creativity.

allWorks.title: Instagram Stories Clone with React native + Expo
allWorks.excerpt: After experimenting with expo-av api, Video component and react-native Animations, I found my way to clone the instagram stories.

allWorks.title: Lockdown Chat
allWorks.excerpt: Chatting with other people in your city, in your country, even with other people in the world.
allWorks.content: This app is I made when I'm bored and want to make something, and I got this idea "How about we can chat with each other in my city or my country.
